reviews.title: Good Pub Food and Beer Average Except.....
reviews.text: the celtic show at night. The food and beer is nothing different than every other pub in Ireland....but instead of live cover band material the Arlington sets itself apart with the celtic dancing show that is worth a look-see. Offered as a 3-course meal for $33Eu or just show up at 8:30 and hope for a bar seat for the price of a pint or two.

i paid about 35 euros for really nice 3 course meal, a traditional live Irish band who where fantastic, traditional Irish dancers who where brilliant, great staff and a wonderfull atmosphere, i had the best night of my stay in Dublin
reviews.title: could not fault this place
